owaspTop10Training.name: Lack of Training or validation on OWASP Top 10
owaspTop10Training.description: At least One Primary Maintainer has taken TBD Training on OWASP Top 10 or Equivalent

npmMfaEnabled.name: MFA is disabled or requires confirmation for npm
npmMfaEnabled.description: It is expected to enforce Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) across the npm Organization
